__description: TUV-x configuration that reporoduces photolysis rate constants of the TUV 5.4 calculator
The original TUV 5.4 source code and data sets can be found here: https://www2.acom.ucar.edu/modeling/tuv-download

rates.name: SCUP-human (de Gruijl and van der Leun, 1994)
